name: Customer's Nightmare
description:
A game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, Let there be chaos.

Your goal in this game is to send an pre-defined email to someone while at the same time closing some annoying popups that is breaking your system, to view the text you need to write, hold down both left and right buttons to do that.

Controls: (left) Ctrl, Alt. (Right) AltGr, Context, Menu, Ctrl.

Source: https://github.com/RexTheCapt/gamejam-brackeys-2020.2

GAME TRAILER

Made by: 
RexTheCapt, Liz Martin, Piotrek4, leinades, OrangeScientist1
